    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tactician's Helm](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2339)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 152 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 160 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn headwear

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Repurposing and enchanting a helmet worn by a battlefield commander can create a _tactician's helm_, imparting knowledge of battlefield tactics that feeds off your minor victories. The helm grants you a +1 item bonus to [Warfare Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) checks. Also, a jewel adorns the brow of the helmet. This jewel becomes charged each time you hit a creature with an [Attack of Opportunity](/Actions.aspx?ID=8). A _tactician's helm_ can hold up to 2 charges, and its charges reset to 0 when you invest it.
